news.summary: The band was included in Spotify UK’s cinematic video celebrating the most streamed artists of the year.

news.title: David Holmes, Róisín El Cherif and Paul Weller collaborate on new single in aid of Medical Aid for Palestinians

news.title: Comedian Aoife Dunne announces additional Good Grief tour dates
Disney+ announces new series The Beauty
news.summary: The new FX  series will premiere on January 22.

news.title: Eric Matthews of Kicky's: "If you love your food, you’re really spoilt for choice at the moment in Dublin"
news.summary: Having learned his craft cheffing in some of the best restaurants in the world, Eric Matthews is now wowing Dubliners with his Creative Quarter eatery, Kicky’s. He talks inspiration, celebrity diners, favourite late night haunts, Heston Blumenthal and the joys of cooking over fire with Stuart Clark.

news.title: Zach Bryan, Luke Combs, and Oasis the most searched musicians in 2025 according to Google
news.summary: Kneecap, Kendrick Lamar, and Robbie Williams are also on the list.
